text: Need River Murphy for Adairs campaign. Budget around $12,671, looking for 1 x 90-second product demo, 3 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x LinkedIn post, 3 x Facebook post, 2 x Article contribution. 4 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 12 months. Engagement period: 2 months.
